# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-110">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-112">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-114">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-115">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-117">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-118">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-119">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-120">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 9 개의 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-146">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-148">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-150">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-151">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-152">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-154">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-155">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-160">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-167">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-167">DNI</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-173">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-175">6-10자리 숫자(은행 지점 번호 포함 또는 제외)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-177">계좌 번호는 6-10자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-178">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-179">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-180">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-181">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-183">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-186">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-188">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-190">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-192">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-192">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-194">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-194">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-195">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-195">correspondent bank</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-207">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-207">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-209">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-209">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-211">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-212">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-213">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-214">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-215">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-216">1-2개의 선택적 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-217">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-218">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-219">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-220">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-221">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-223">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-224">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-225">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-226">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-326">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-328">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-330">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-331">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-332">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-333">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-334">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-338">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-339">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-340">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-341">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-342">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-343">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-343">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-344">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-344">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-356">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-356">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-358">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-358">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-360">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-360">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-365">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-365">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-366">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-366">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-400">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-400">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-401">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-401">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-402">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-402">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-403">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-403">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-404">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백과 함께 표시되는 8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-404">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-405">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-405">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-406">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-406">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-407">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-407">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-408">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-408">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-409">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-409">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-411">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-411">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-414">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-414">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-415">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-415">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-416">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-416">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-417">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-417">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-418">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-418">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-419">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-419">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-420">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-420">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-421">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-421">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-422">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-422">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-423">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-423">service veterans</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-425">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-425">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-426">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-426">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-427">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-427">tfn</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_number_exclusions"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-428">Keyword_number_exclusions</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-428">Keyword_number_exclusions</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-429">00000000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-429">00000000</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-430">11111111</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-430">11111111</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-459">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-459">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-460">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-460">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-461">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-462">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-462">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-463">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-464">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-464">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-465">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-465">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-466">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-466">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-467">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-467">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-468">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-468">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-469">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-469">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-470">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-470">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-472">**Keywords_austria_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-472">**Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-476">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-476">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-481">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-481">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-482">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-482">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-483">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-483">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-487">오스트리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-487">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-488">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-488">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-489">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-490">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-490">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-491">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-491">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-492">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-492">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-493">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-493">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-494">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-494">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-495">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-496">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-496">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-497">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-498">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-499">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-499">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-500">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-500">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-501">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-501">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-502">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-502">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-503">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-503">identity number</span></span>

national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-504">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-505">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-505">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-506">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-506">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-507">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-507">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-508">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-509">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-509">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-511">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-511">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-512">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-512">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-513">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-513">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-514">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-514">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-515">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-516">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-516">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-518">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-519">정규식이 해당 `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-519">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-520">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-520">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-521">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-521">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-522">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-522">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-528">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-528">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-529">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-531">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-531">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-533">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-533">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-534">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-534">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-535">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-535">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-536">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-536">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-537">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-538">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-538">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-540">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-541">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-541">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-542">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-543">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-543">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-544">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-544">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-560">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-560">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-561">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 ID 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-561">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-562">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-563">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-563">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-564">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-565">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-565">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-566">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-566">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-567">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-567">A hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-568">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-568">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-569">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-569">A forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-570">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-570">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-571">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-572">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-572">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-573">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-574">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-575">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-575">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-576">From 키워드를 `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-576">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-577">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-577">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-578">이 함수는 해당 `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-578">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-601">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-601">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-602">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-603">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-603">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-604">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-604">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-605">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-605">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-606">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-606">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-607">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-607">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-608">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-608">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-609">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-609">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-610">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-611">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-611">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-612">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-613">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-613">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-614">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-614">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-615">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-615">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-616">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-616">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-617">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-617">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-618">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-618">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-621">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-621">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-622">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-622">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-623">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-623">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-624">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-624">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-625">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-625">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-626">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-626">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-627">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-627">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-628">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-628">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-629">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-629">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-630">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-630">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-631">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-632">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-632">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-633">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-633">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-634">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-634">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-635">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-635">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-636">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-637">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-637">The string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-638">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-638">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-639">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-639">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-640">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-640">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-641">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-641">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-642">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-642">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-643">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-643">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-644">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-644">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-645">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-645">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-646">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-646">Any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-647">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-647">The string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-648">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-648">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-649">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-649">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-650">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-650">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-651">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-651">One or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-652">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-652">A semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-653">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-654">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-655">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-656">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-656">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-657">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-657">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-658">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-658">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-659">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-659">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-660">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-660">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-661">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-661">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-662">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-662">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-663">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-663">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-664">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-664">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-665">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-665">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-666">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-666">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-667">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-667">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-668">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-668">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-669">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-669">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-670">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-670">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-671">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-671">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-672">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-672">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-673">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-673">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-674">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-675">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-675">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-676">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-676">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-677">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-677">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-678">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-678">The string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-679">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-679">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-680">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-680">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-681">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-681">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-682">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-682">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-683">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-683">The string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-684">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-684">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-685">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-685">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-686">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-686">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-687">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-687">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-688">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-688">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-689">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-689">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-690">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-690">Any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-691">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-691">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-693">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-693">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-696">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-696">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-697">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-697">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-698">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-698">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-699">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-699">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-700">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-700">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-701">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-701">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-702">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-702">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-703">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-703">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-704">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-704">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-705">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-705">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-706">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-706">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-707">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-707">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-708">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-708">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-709">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-709">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-710">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-710">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-711">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-711">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-712">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-712">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-713">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-714">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-714">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-715">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-715">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-716">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-716">The string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-717">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-717">Any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-718">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-718">A quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-719">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-720">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-720">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-721">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-722">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-722">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-723">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-723">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-724">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-724">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-725">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-725">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-739">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-739">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-740">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-741">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-741">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-742">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-742">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-743">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-744">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-744">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-745">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-745">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-746">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-746">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-747">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-747">The string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-748">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-748">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-749">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-749">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-750">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-750">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-751">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-751">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-752">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-752">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-753">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-754">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-754">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-755">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-756">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-757">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-757">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-758">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-758">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-765">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-765">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-766">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-766">onebox</span></span>
