## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-773">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-773">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-774">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-775">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-775">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-776">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-776">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-777">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-777">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-778">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-778">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-779">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-779">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-780">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-780">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-781">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-781">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-782">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-782">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-783">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-783">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-784">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-785">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-785">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-786">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-787">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-788">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-788">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-789">Azure Service Bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-789">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-790">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-791">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-791">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-792">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-792">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-793">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-794">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-794">The string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-795">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-795">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-796">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-796">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-797">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-797">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-798">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-798">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-799">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-799">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-800">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-800">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-801">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-801">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-802">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-802">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-803">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-803">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-804">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-804">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-805">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-805">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-806">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-806">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-807">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-807">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-808">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-808">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-809">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-809">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-810">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-810">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-811">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-811">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-812">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-812">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-813">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-813">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-814">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-814">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-816">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-816">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-817">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-817">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-818">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-818">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-819">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-819">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-820">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-820">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-821">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-821">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-828">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-828">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-829">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-830">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-830">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-831">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-831">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-832">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-832">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-833">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-833">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-834">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-834">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-835">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-835">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-836">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-836">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-837">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-837">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-838">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-838">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-839">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-839">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-840">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-840">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-841">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-841">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-842">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-842">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-843">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-844">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-845">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-846">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-846">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-847">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-847">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-848">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-848">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-849">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-849">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-850">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-850">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azureemulatorstorageaccountfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-851">CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-851">CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-852">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-852">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-853">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw = =</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-853">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-854">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-854">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-855">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-855">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-856">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-856">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-857">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-857">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-858">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-858">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-859">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-859">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-860">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-860">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-861">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-861">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-862">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-862">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-863">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-863">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-864">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-864">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-865">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-865">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="c707d-866">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-866">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-867">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-867">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-868">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-869">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-869">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-870">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-870">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-871">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-871">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-872">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-872">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-873">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-873">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-874">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-875">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-875">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-876">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-877">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-877">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-878">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-878">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-879">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-879">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-880">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-881">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-882">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-882">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-884">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-884">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-889">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-889">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-890">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-890">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-891">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-891">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-892">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-892">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-896">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-896">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-897">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-897">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-898">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-898">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-899">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-899">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-900">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-900">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-901">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-901">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-902">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-902">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-903">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-903">dlno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-906">führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-906">führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-907">fuhrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-907">fuhrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-908">fuehrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-908">fuehrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-909">führerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-909">führerschein- nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-910">fuehrerschein-Veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-910">fuehrerschein- Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-911">fuehrerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-911">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-912">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-912">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-913">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-913">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-914">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-915">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-915">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-916">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-917">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-917">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-918">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-918">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-919">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-919">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-920">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-920">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-921">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-921">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-922">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-922">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-923">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-923">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-924">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-924">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-925">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-925">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-926">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-926">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-927">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-927">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-928">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-928">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-929">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-988">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-988">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-989">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-989">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-990">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-990">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-991">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-991">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-992">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-992">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-993">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-993">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-994">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-995">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-995">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-996">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-997">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-997">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-998">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-998">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-999">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-999">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1000">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1000">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1001">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1001">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1002">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1002">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1003">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1003">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1004">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1004">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1005">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1005">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1006">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1006">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1007">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1007">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1008">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1008">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1009">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1009">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1010">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1010">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1011">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1012">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1012">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1013">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1014">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1014">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1015">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1016">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1016">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1017">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1018">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1019">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1020">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1020">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1021">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1021">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1022">이 함수는 해당 `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1022">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1042">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1042">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1043">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1044">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1045">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1045">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1047">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1047">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1048">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1048">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1049">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1049">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1050">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1050">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1051">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1051">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1052">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1052">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1053">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1054">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1054">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1055">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1056">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1057">정규식이 해당 `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1057">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1058">From 키워드를 `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1058">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1117">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1117">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1118">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1119">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1119">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1120">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1121">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1121">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1122">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1122">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1123">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1123">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1124">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1124">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1125">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1125">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1126">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1126">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1127">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1127">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1128">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1128">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1129">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1129">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1130">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1130">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1132">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1132">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1134">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1135">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1135">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1136">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1136">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1137">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1138">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1139">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1139">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1140">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1140">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1142">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1142">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1145">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1145">Registration</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1152">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1152">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1153">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1153">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1154">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1154">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1155">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1155">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1156">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1156">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1157">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1157">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1158">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1158">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1159">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1159">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1160">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1160">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1161">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1161">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1162">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1162">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1163">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1163">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1164">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1164">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1165">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1165">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1166">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1166">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1167">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1167">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1168">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1168">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1169">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1169">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1170">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1170">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1171">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1171">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1172">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1173">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1173">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1174">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1174">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1175">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1175">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1197">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1197">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1198">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1199">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1199">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1200">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1200">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1201">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1202">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1202">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1203">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1203">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1204">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1204">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1205">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1205">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1206">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1206">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1207">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1207">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1208">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1208">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1209">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1209">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1210">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1210">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1211">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1211">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1212">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1212">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1213">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1213">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1218">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1218">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1219">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1219">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1222">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1222">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1223">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1234">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1234">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1235">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1236">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1237">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1237">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1239">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1239">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1240">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1240">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1241">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1241">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1242">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1242">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1243">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1243">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1244">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1244">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1245">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1245">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1264">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1264">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1265">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1265">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1266">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1266">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1267">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1267">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1268">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1268">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1269">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1269">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1270">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1270">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1271">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1271">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1272">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1272">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1273">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1273">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1274">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1275">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1275">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1276">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1278">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1279">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1279">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1280">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1280">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1281">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1281">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1326">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1326">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1327">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1327">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1328">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1329">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1329">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1330">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1330">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1331">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1331">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1332">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1333">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1333">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1335">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1336">정규식이 해당 `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1337">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1344">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1344">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1345">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1345">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1346">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1347">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1347">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1348">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1349">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1349">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1350">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1350">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1351">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1351">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1352">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1352">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1353">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1353">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1354">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1355">From 키워드를 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1355">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1357">이 함수는 해당 `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1357">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1402">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1402">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1403">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1404">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1404">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1405">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1406">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1406">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1407">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1407">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1408">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1408">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1409">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1409">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1410">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1410">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1411">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1411">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1412">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1412">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1413">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1414">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1414">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1415">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1416">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1416">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1417">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1417">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1418">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1418">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1419">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1419">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1420">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1421">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1421">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1422">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1422">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1446">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1446">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1447">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1448">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1448">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1450">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1450">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1452">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1452">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1455">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1455">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1456">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1456">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1457">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1457">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1593">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1593">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1595">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1595">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1596">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1596">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1597">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1597">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1598">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1599">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1599">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1600">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1601">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1602">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1602">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1603">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1603">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1604">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1604">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1606">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1606">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1608">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1608">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1609">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1609">speciality services</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1612">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1612">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1613">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1613">workers compensation</span></span>
