## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1615">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1615">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1616">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1617">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1617">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1618">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1619">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1619">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1621">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1624">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1624">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1625">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1625">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1655">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1655">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1656">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1657">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1657">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1658">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1659">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1659">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1660">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1661">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1661">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1662">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1663">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1663">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1664">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1664">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1665">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1665">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1666">Keyword_canada_phin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1666">Keyword_canada_phin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1667">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1667">social insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1668">health information act</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1668">health information act</span></span>

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1697">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1697">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1698">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1698">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1699">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1699">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1700">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1700">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1701">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1701">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1702">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1702">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1703">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1703">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1704">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1704">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1705">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1705">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1706">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1706">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1707">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1707">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1708">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1709">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1711">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1712">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1712">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1713">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1713">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1714">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1714">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1715">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1715">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1716">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1716">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1717">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1717">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1718">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1718">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1719">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1719">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1720">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1720">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1721">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1721">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1746">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1746">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1747">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1747">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1748">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1748">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1749">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1749">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1750">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1750">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1751">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1751">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1752">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1752">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1753">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1753">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1754">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1754">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1755">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1755">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1756">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1756">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1757">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1757">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1762">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1762">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1763">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1763">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1764">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1766">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1766">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1767">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1767">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1768">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1769">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1769">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1770">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1770">National Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1774">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1774">Rol Único Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1775">실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1775">RUN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1776">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1776">Rol Único Tributario</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1777">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1777">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1778">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1778">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1779">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1779">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1780">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1780">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1781">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1781">Identificación</span></span> 
   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1782">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1782">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1783">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1784">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1784">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1785">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1786">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1786">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1787">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1787">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1788">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1788">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1789">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1789">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1790">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1790">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1791">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1791">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1792">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1792">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1793">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1793">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1794">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1795">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1795">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1796">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1796">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1797">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1798">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1798">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1799">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1799">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1800">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1800">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1803">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1803">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1805">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1805">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1806">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1806">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1807">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1807">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1808">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1808">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1809">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1809">鉴定</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1813">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1813">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1814">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1815">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1815">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1817">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1817">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1818">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1819">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1819">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-1820">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1821">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1821">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1822">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1822">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1823">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1823">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1824">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1824">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1825">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1825">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1826">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1826">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1827">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1827">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-1828">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1828">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1829">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1829">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-1830">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-1830">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2036">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2036">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2037">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2037">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2038">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2038">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2039">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2039">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2040">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2040">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2041">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2041">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2042">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2042">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2043">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2043">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2044">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2044">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2045">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2045">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2046">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2046">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2047">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2047">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2048">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2048">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2049">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2049">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2050">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2050">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2051">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2051">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2052">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2052">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2053">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2053">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2054">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2054">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2055">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2055">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2056">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2056">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2057">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2057">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2058">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2058">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2059">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2059">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2060">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2060">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2061">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2061">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2062">vozačka dozvola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2062">vozačka dozvola</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2063">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2063">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2064">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2064">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2065">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2066">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2066">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2067">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2068">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2068">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2069">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2070">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2070">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2071">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2072">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2072">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2073">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2073">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2074">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2074">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2105">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2105">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2106">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2106">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2107">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2108">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2108">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2109">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2109">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2110">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2110">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2111">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2112">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2113">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2114">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2114">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2115">정규식이 해당 `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2115">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2116">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2116">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2117">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2117">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2118">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2118">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2119">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2119">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2120">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2120">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2121">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2121">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2122">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2122">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2123">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2123">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2124">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2125">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2125">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2126">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2127">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2127">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2128">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2128">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2129">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2129">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2130">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2131">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2131">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2132">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2133">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2133">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2134">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2134">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2135">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2135">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2138">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2138">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2140">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2140">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2141">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2141">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2142">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2142">Personal Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2144">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2144">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2145">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2145">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2146">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2148">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2148">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2149">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2150">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2150">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2151">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2151">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2152">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2152">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2153">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2154">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2154">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2156">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2157">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2157">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2158">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2158">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2160">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2160">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2177">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2177">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2178">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2178">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2179">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2180">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2180">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2181">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2182">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2182">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2183">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2183">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2184">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2184">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2186">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2186">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2189">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2189">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2190">From 키워드를 `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2190">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2191">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2191">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2192">이 함수는 해당 `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2192">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2207">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2223">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2223">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2224">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2224">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2225">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2225">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2226">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2226">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2227">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2227">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2228">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2228">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2229">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2229">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2230">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2230">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2231">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2231">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2232">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2232">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2233">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2233">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2234">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2234">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2236">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2236">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2240">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2240">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2243">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2243">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2244">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2244">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2245">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2245">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2246">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2246">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2247">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2247">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2248">άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2248">άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2249">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2249">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2250">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2251">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2252">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2252">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2253">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2253">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2254">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2254">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2255">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2255">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2256">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2256">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2257">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2257">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2258">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2258">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2259">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2259">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2260">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2260">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2261">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2261">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2262">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2262">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2263">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2263">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2264">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2264">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2265">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2265">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2266">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2266">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2267">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2267">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2268">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2268">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2269">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2269">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2270">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2270">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2271">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2272">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2272">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2273">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2274">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2274">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2275">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2276">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2276">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2277">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2278">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2279">정규식이 해당 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2279">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2280">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2280">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2281">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2281">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2282">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2282">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2283">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2283">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2284">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2284">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2285">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2285">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2286">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2286">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2287">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2287">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2288">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2288">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2289">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2290">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2290">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2291">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2292">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2292">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2293">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2293">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2294">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2294">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2295">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2295">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2297">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2297">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2300">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2300">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2301">From 키워드를 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2301">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2302">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2303">이 함수는 해당 `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2303">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2304">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2304">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2305">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2305">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2308">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2308">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2309">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2309">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2310">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2310">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2311">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2311">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2312">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2312">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2313">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2313">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2314">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2314">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2315">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2315">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2316">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2316">taxidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2319">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2319">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2320">tic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2320">tic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2321">tic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2321">tic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2322">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2322">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2323">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2323">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2324">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2324">tin#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2330">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2330">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>
