## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2332">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2332">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2333">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2333">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2334">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2335">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2335">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2336">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2337">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2337">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2338">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2338">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2339">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2339">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2340">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2340">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2341">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2342">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2342">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2343">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2344">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2345">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2345">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2346">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2346">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2347">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2347">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2348">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2348">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2349">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2349">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2350">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2350">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2351">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2351">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2352">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2352">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2353">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2353">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2354">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2354">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2355">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2355">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2356">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2356">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2357">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2358">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2358">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2359">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2359">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2360">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2360">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2361">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2361">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2362">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2362">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2363">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2363">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2364">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2364">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2365">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2366">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2366">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2367">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2368">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2368">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2369">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2369">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2370">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2370">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2371">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2371">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2372">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2372">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2373">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2373">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2374">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2374">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2375">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2375">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2376">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2376">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2377">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2377">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2378">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2378">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2379">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2379">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2380">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2380">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2381">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2381">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2382">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2382">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2383">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2383">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2384">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2385">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2385">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2387">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2387">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2388">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2388">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2389">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2389">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2390">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2390">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2391">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2391">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2392">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2392">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2393">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2393">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2394">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2394">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2395">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2395">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2396">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2396">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2397">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2397">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2398">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2398">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2399">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2399">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2400">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2400">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2401">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2401">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2402">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2402">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2403">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2403">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2404">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2404">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2405">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2405">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2406">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2406">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2407">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2407">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2408">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2408">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2409">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2409">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2410">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2410">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2411">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2411">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2412">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2412">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2413">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2413">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2414">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2414">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2415">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2415">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2416">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2416">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2417">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2417">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2418">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2419">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2419">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2420">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2421">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2422">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2422">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2423">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2423">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2424">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2425">이 함수는 해당 `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2425">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2441">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2441">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2442">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2442">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2443">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2444">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2444">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2446">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2446">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2447">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2447">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2448">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2448">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2449">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2449">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2451">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2451">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2454">정규식이 해당 `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2454">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2455">From 키워드를 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2455">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2494">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2494">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2495">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2495">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2496">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2497">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2497">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2499">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2499">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2500">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2501">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2501">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2502">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2503">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2503">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2504">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2504">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2505">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2505">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2506">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2506">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2507">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2507">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2508">| dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2508">|dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2509">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2509">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2510">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2510">driver license number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2522">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2522">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2523">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2523">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2524">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2525">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2525">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2526">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2526">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2527">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2527">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2528">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2529">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2530">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2531">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2531">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2532">정규식이 해당 `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2532">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2533">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2533">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2534">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2534">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2535">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2535">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2536">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2536">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2537">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2537">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2538">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2538">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2539">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2539">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2540">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2540">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2541">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2541">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2542">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2542">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2543">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2544">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2544">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2545">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2546">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2546">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2547">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2547">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2548">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2548">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2549">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2549">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2550">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2550">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2551">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2551">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2552">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2552">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2553">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2553">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2554">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2554">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2555">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2607">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2607">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2608">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2608">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2609">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2610">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2610">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2611">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2612">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2612">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2613">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2613">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2614">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2614">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2615">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2615">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2616">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2617">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2617">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2618">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2619">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2620">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2620">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2621">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2621">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2622">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2622">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2623">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2623">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2637">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2637">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2638">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2638">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2639">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2639">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2640">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2640">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2641">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2641">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2642">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2642">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2643">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2643">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2644">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2644">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2645">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2645">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2646">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2647">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2647">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2648">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2650">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2650">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2651">From 키워드를 `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2651">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2653">이 함수는 해당 `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2653">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2705">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2705">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2706">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2706">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2707">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2707">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2708">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2708">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2709">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2709">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2710">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2710">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2711">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2711">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2712">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2712">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2714">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2717">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2717">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2718">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2718">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2719">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2719">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2720">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2720">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2721">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2721">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2722">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2722">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2723">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2724">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2724">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2726">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2726">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2727">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2727">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2728">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2728">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2729">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2729">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2730">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2730">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2731">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2731">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2732">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2733">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2733">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2734">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2734">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2735">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2735">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2736">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2736">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2740">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2740">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2741">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2741">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2742">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2742">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2743">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2743">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2744">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2744">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2745">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2745">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2746">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2746">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2747">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2747">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2748">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2748">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2749">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2749">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2750">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2750">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2751">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2751">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2752">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2753">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2753">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2754">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2755">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2755">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2756">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2756">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2757">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2757">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2758">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2758">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2759">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2759">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2760">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2761">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2762">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2763">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2763">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2764">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2764">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2765">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2765">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2766">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2767">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2767">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2800">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2800">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2801">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2801">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2802">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2802">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2803">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2803">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2804">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2804">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2805">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2805">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2806">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2807">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2807">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2809">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2810">정규식이 해당 `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2810">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2811">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2811">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2812">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2812">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2813">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2813">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2818">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2818">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2819">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2819">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2820">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2821">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2821">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2822">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2823">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2823">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2824">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2824">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2825">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2825">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2826">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2826">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2827">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2827">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2832">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2832">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2833">From 키워드를 `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2833">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2835">이 함수는 해당 `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2835">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2868">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2868">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2869">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2870">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2870">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2871">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2872">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2872">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-2875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-2876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2877">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2877">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2878">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2878">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2879">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2879">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2880">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2880">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2881">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2881">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2882">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2882">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2883">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2883">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-2884">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-2884">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3330">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3330">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3331">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3331">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3332">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3333">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3333">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3334">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3335">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3335">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3336">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3336">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3337">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3337">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3338">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3338">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3339">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3340">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3340">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3341">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3343">정규식이 해당 `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3343">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3344">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3344">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3345">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3345">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3346">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3346">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3347">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3347">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3348">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3348">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3349">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3349">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3350">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3350">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3351">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3351">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3352">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3352">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3353">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3353">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3354">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3354">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3355">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3355">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3356">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3356">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3357">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3358">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3358">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3359">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3359">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3360">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3360">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3361">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3361">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3362">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3363">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3363">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3364">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3365">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3365">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3366">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3366">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3367">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3367">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3368">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3368">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3369">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3369">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3370">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3371">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3371">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3372">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3373">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3373">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3374">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3374">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3375">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3375">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3376">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3376">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3425">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3425">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3426">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3426">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3427">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3427">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3428">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3428">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3429">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3429">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3430">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3430">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3431">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3431">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3432">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3432">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3433">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3434">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3435">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3435">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3436">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3436">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3437">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3437">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3438">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3438">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3439">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3439">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3440">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3440">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3441">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3441">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3442">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3442">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3443">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3444">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3444">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3445">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3446">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3446">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3447">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3447">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3448">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3448">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3449">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3449">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3450">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3450">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3451">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3451">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3452">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3452">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3453">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3453">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3454">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3455">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3455">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3456">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3458">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3458">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3459">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3459">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3460">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3461">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3461">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```
