## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3485">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3485">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3486">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3486">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3487">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3487">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3488">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3488">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3489">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3489">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3490">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3490">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3491">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3491">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3492">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3492">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3493">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3493">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3494">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3494">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3495">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3495">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3496">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3496">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3497">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3497">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3498">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3499">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3499">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3500">From 키워드를 `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3500">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3501">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3501">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3502">이 함수는 해당 `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3502">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3553">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3553">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3554">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3554">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3555">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3556">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3556">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3557">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3558">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3558">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3559">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3560">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3560">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3561">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3562">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3563">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3563">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3564">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3564">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3565">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3565">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3566">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3566">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3567">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3567">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3571">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3571">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3572">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3572">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3573">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3573">permis de conduire</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3575">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3575">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3576">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3576">licence numbers</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3578">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3578">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3579">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3579">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3580">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3581">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3581">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3582">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3583">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3583">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3584">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3585">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3586">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3587">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3588">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3588">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3600">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3600">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3601">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3601">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3602">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3602">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3603">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3604">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3604">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3606">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3606">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3607">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3607">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3608">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3608">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3609">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3609">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3610">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3611">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3611">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3612">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3613">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3614">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3614">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3615">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3615">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3616">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3616">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3617">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3617">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3618">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3618">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3619">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3619">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3620">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3620">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3621">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3621">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3622">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3622">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3623">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3623">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3624">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3624">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3625">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3625">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3626">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3626">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3627">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3627">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3628">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3628">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3629">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3629">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3630">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3630">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3631">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3631">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3632">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3632">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3633">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3633">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3634">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3634">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3635">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3635">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3636">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3636">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3637">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3637">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3638">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3638">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3639">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3639">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3640">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3640">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3641">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3641">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3642">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3642">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3643">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3643">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3644">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3644">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3645">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3645">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3646">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3646">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3647">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3647">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3648">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3648">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3649">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3649">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3650">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3650">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3651">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3651">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3652">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3653">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3653">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3654">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3654">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3655">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3656">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3656">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3657">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3657">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3658">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3658">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3659">securité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3659">securité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3660">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3660">securite sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3662">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3662">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3663">numéro d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3663">numéro d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3664">no d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3664">no d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3665">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3665">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3666">d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3666">d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3667">numero d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3667">numero d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3668">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3668">no d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3669">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3669">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3670">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3670">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3671">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3671">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3672">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3672">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3673">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3673">social insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3674">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3674">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3675">d'identité nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3675">d'identité nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3676">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3676">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3677">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3677">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3678">numéro d'assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3678">numéro d'assurance sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3679">numéro de sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3679">numéro de sécu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3680">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3680">code sécu</span></span> 

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3681">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3681">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3682">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3682">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3684">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3684">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3686">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3686">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3687">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3687">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3688">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3688">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3689">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3689">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3690">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3690">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3691">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3691">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3692">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3692">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3693">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3694">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3694">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3695">From 키워드를 `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3695">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3696">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3697">이 함수는 해당 `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3697">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3717">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3717">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3718">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3718">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3719">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3720">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3720">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3721">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3722">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3722">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3723">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3723">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3724">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3724">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3725">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3725">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3726">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3726">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3727">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3727">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3728">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3728">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3729">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3729">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3730">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3730">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3731">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3731">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3732">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3732">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3733">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3733">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3734">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3734">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3735">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3735">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3736">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3736">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3737">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3830">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3830">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3831">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3831">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3832">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3832">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3833">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3833">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3834">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3834">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3835">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3835">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3836">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3837">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3837">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3838">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3838">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3839">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3839">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3840">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3840">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3841">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3841">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3843">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3843">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3845">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3846">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3846">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3847">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3847">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3848">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3848">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3849">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3849">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3851">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3851">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3852">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3852">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3853">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3853">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3854">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3854">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3855">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3855">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3856">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3856">identity number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3863">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3863">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3864">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3864">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3865">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3866">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3866">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3867">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3868">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3868">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3869">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3869">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3870">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3870">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3871">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3871">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3872">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3872">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3873">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3874">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3875">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3876">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3876">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3877">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3877">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3878">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3878">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3879">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3879">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3880">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3880">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3881">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3881">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3882">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3882">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3883">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3883">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3901">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3901">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3902">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3902">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3903">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3904">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3904">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3905">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3906">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3906">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3907">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3907">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3908">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3908">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3909">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3910">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3910">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3913">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3913">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3914">From 키워드를 `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3914">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3915">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3915">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3916">이 함수는 해당 `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3916">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3942">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3942">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3943">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3943">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3944">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3944">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3945">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3945">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3946">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3946">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3947">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3947">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3948">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3948">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3949">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3949">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3950">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3950">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3951">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3951">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3952">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3952">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3953">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3953">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3954">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3954">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3955">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3955">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3958">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3958">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3959">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3959">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3960">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3960">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3961">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3961">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3962">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3962">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3963">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3963">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3964">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3964">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3965">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3965">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3966">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3966">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3967">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3967">dlno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3969">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3969">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3970">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3970">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3971">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3971">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3972">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3973">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3973">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3974">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3975">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3975">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3976">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3976">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3977">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3977">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3978">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3978">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3979">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3979">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3980">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3980">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3981">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3981">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3982">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3982">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3983">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3983">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3984">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3984">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3985">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3985">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-3986">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3986">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3987">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3987">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3988">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3988">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3989">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3989">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3990">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3990">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3991">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3991">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3992">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3992">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3993">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3993">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3994">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3994">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3995">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3995">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3996">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3996">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3997">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3997">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-3998">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3998">ταυτότητας</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-3999">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-3999">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4000">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4000">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4001">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4002">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4002">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4004">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4004">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4005">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4006">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4006">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4008">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4008">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4009">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4009">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4010">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4010">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4011">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4011">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4012">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4012">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4013">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4013">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4014">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4014">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4015">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4015">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4016">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4016">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4017">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4017">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4018">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4018">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4019">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4019">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4020">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4020">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4021">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4021">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4022">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4022">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4023">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4024">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4024">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4027">정규식이 해당 `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4027">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4028">From 키워드를 `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4028">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4057">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4057">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4058">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4059">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4059">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4060">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4060">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4061">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4061">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4062">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4062">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4063">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4063">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4064">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4064">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4065">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4066">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4067">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4068">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4069">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4069">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4070">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4070">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4071">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4072">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4072">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4073">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4073">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4074">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4074">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4105">香港非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4105">香港非永久性居民身分証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4106">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4106">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4107">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4107">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4113">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4113">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>
   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4114">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4114">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4115">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4115">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4116">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4116">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4117">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4117">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4118">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4119">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4119">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4120">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4120">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4121">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4121">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4122">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4123">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4123">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4125">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4126">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4126">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4127">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4127">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4128">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4128">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4129">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4129">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4130">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4130">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4131">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4131">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4132">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4132">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4133">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4133">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4134">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4134">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4135">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4135">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4136">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4136">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4137">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4137">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4138">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4138">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4139">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4139">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4140">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4140">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4141">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4141">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4142">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4142">vezetoi engedely</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4143">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4143">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4144">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4144">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4145">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4146">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4146">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4147">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4148">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4148">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4149">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4149">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4150">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4150">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4151">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4151">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4152">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4152">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4153">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4154">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4154">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4156">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4157">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4157">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4158">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4158">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4160">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4160">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4161">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4161">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4162">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4162">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>
