- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4165">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4165">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4166">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4166">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4167">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4167"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4168">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4168">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4169">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4169">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4170">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4170">személyi igazolvány</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4171">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4171">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4172">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4172">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4173">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4174">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4174">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4175">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4176">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4176">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4177">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4178">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4178">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4179">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4180">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4180">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4181">정규식이 해당 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4181">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4182">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4182">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4183">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4183">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4184">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4184">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4185">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4185">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4186">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4186">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4187">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4187">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4188">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4188">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4189">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4189">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4190">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4190">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4191">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4192">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4192">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4193">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4194">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4194">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4195">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4196">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4196">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4199">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4199">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4200">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4200">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4201">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4202">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4202">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4222">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4222">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4223">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4223">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4224">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4225">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4225">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4226">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4227">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4227">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4228">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4228">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4229">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4229">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4230">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4230">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4231">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4231">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4232">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4232">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4233">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4233">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4234">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4234">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4235">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4235">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4236">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4236">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4237">From 키워드를 `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4237">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4238">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4238">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4239">이 함수는 해당 `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4239">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4251">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4251">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4265">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4265">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4266">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4266">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4267">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4267">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4268">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4268">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4269">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4269">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4270">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4270">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4271">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4271">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4272">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4272">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4273">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4273">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4274">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4274">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4275">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4275">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4276">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4276">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4277">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4277">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4278">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4278">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4279">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4279">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4280">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4280">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4281">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4281">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4282">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4282">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4283">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4283">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4284">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4284">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4285">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4286">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4286">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4287">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4288">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4288">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4289">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4289">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4290">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4290">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4291">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4291">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4292">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4292">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4293">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4293">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4294">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4295">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4296">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4297">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4298">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4298">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4299">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4299">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4300">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4300">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4301">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4301">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4302">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4302">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4303">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4303">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4304">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4304">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4305">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4305">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4306">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4306">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4307">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4307">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4308">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4308">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4309">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4310">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4310">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4311">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4312">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4312">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4313">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4313">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4314">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4314">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4315">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4315">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4316">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4316">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4317">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4317">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4318">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4318">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4319">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4319">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4320">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4320">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4321">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4322">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4323">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4324">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4324">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4325">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4325">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4326">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4326">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4327">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4327">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4328">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4328">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4329">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4329">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4330">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4330">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4331">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4331">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4332">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4332">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4333">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4333">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4334">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4334">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4335">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4336">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4336">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4337">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4338">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4338">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4339">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4339">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4340">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4340">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4341">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4341">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4342">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4342">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4343">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4343">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4344">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4344">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4345">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, </c12>,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4345">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4346">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4346">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4347">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4347">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4348">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4348">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4349">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4349">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4350">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4350">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4351">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4351">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4352">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4352">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4353">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4353">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4354">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4354">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4356">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4356">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4358">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4358">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4360">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4360">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4363">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4363">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4364">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4364">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4366">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4366">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4367">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4367">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4368">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4368">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4369">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4369">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4370">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4370">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4371">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4371">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4372">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4372">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4373">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4373">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4374">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4374">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4375">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4375">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4376">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4376">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4377">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4378">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4378">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4379">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4380">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4380">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4381">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4381">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4382">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4382">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4383">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4383">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4384">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4384">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4385">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4385">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4386">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4386">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4387">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4387">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4388">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4388">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4389">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4389">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4390">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4390">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4391">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4391">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4392">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4392">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4393">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4393">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4394">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4394">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4395">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4395">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4396">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4396">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4397">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4397">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4398">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4398">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4399">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4399">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4400">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4400">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4401">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4401">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4402">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4402">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4403">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4403">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4404">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4404">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4405">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4405">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4406">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4406">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4407">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4407">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4408">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4408">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4409">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4409">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4410">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4410">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4416">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4416">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4417">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4417">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4418">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4418">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4419">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4419">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4420">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4420">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4421">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4421">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4422">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4422">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4423">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4423">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4424">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4425">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4426">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4427">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4428">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4428">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4429">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4429">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4430">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4430">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4431">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4431">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4432">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4432">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4434">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4434">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4435">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4435">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4436">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4436">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4437">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4437">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4438">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4438">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4439">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4439">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4440">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4440">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4441">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4441">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4442">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4442">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4443">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4443">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4444">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4444">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4445">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4445">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4446">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4446">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4447">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4448">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4448">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4449">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4450">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4450">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4451">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4451">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4452">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4452">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4453">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4453">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4454">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4454">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4455">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4455">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4456">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4456">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4457">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4457">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4458">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4458">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4459">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4460">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4460">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4461">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4462">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4462">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4463">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4463">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4464">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4464">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4465">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4466">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4466">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4495">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4495">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4496">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4496">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4497">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4498">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4498">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4499">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4500">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4500">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4501">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4501">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4502">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4502">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4503">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4504">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4504">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4505">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4506">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4507">정규식이 해당 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4507">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4508">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4508">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4509">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4509">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4510">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4510">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4511">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4511">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4512">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4512">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4513">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4513">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4514">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4514">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4515">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4515">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4516">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4516">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4517">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4517">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4518">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4518">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4519">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4520">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4520">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4521">7자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4521">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4522">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4522">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4523">7자리 숫자와 2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4523">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4524">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4524">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4525">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4525">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4526">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4526">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4527">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4527">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4528">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4528">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4529">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4529">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4530">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4530">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4531">문자 "A" 또는 "H"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4531">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4532">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4533">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4534">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4535">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4535">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4536">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4536">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4537">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4537">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4538">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4538">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4539">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4539">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4540">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4541">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4542">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4542">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4543">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4544">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4544">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ireland_pps"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4545">Keyword_ireland_pps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4545">Keyword_ireland_pps</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4546">Personal Public Service Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4546">Personal Public Service Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4547">PPS Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4547">PPS Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4548">PPS Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4548">PPS Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4549">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4549">PPS No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4550">PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4550">PPS #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4551">.PPS #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4551">PPS#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4552">PPSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4552">PPSN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4553">Public Services Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4553">Public Services Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4554">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4554">Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4555">Uimh</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4555">Uimh.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4556">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4556">PSP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4557">PSP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4557">PSP</span></span> 


## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4558">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4558">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4559">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4560">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4561">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4561">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4562">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4563">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4563">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4564">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4564">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4565">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4565">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4566">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4567">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4567">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4570">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4570">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4571">From 키워드를 `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4571">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4573">이 함수는 해당 `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4573">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
