## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4602">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4602">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4603">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4604">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4604">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4605">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4606">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4606">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4607">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4607">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4608">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4608">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4609">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4609">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4610">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4610">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4611">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4611">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4612">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4612">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4613">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4613">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4614">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4614">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4615">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4615">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4616">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4616">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4617">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4617">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4618">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4618">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4619">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4619">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4620">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4620">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4621">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4621">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4622">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4622">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4623">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4623">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4624">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4624">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4625">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4625">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4626">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4626">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4627">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4628">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4628">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4629">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4630">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4630">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4631">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4632">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4632">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4633">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4634">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4634">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4635">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4635">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4636">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4637">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4637">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4638">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4638">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4639">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4639">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4640">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4640">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4641">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4641">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4642">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4642">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4643">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4643">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4644">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4645">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4645">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4646">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4646">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4647">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4647">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4648">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4648">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4649">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4649">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4650">7개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4650">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4651">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4651">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4652">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4653">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4653">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4654">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4655">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4655">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4656">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4656">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4657">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4657">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4658">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4659">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4659">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4660">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4660">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4661">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4661">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4662">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4662">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4663">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4664">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4665">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4665">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4667">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4667">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4668">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4668">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4669">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4669">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4670">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4670">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4671">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4671">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4672">Genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4672">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4673">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4673">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4674">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4674">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4675">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4676">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4676">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4677">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4678">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4678">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4679">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4679">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4680">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4680">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4681">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4681">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4682">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4682">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4717">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4717">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4718">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4718">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4719">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4719">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4720">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4720">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4721">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4721">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4722">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4722">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4723">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4723">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4724">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4724">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4725">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4726">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4726">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4728">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4729">정규식이 해당 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4729">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4730">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4730">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4731">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4731">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4732">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4732">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4733">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4733">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4734">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4734">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4735">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4735">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4736">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4736">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4737">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4737">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4738">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4738">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4739">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4739">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4740">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4740">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4741">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4741">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4742">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4742">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4743">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4745">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4745">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4747">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4747">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4748">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4748">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4749">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4749">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4750">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4750">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4751">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4751">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4752">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4752">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4753">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4753">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4754">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4754">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4755">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4756">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4756">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4758">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4759">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4759">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4760">From 키워드를 `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4760">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4761">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4762">이 함수는 해당 `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4762">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4797">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4797">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4798">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4799">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4799">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4800">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4801">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4801">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4802">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4802">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4803">은행 계좌 지점 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4803">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4804">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4804">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4805">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4805">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4806">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4806">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4807">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4807">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4808">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4808">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4809">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4809">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4810">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4810">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4811">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4812">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4813">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4813">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4814">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4814">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4815">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4815">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4816">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4817">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4817">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4818">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4818">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4877">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4877">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4878">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4879">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4879">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4880">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4881">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4881">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4886">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4886">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4887">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4887">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4915">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4915">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4916">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4916">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4917">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4917">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4918">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4918">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4919">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4919">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4920">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4921">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4921">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4923">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4923">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4924">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4924">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4925">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4925">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4926">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4926">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4932">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4932">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4933">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4934">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4934">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4935">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4936">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4936">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4937">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4937">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4938">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4938">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4939">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4939">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4944">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4944">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4945">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4945">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4947">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4947">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4948">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4948">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4949">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4949">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4950">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4950">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4952">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4952">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4953">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4954">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4954">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4955">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4956">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4956">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4957">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4958">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4959">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4960">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4961">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4961">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4962">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4962">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4976">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4976">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4977">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4978">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4978">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4979">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4980">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4980">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4981">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4981">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4982">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4982">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4983">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4983">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4984">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4984">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4985">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4986">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4986">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4987">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4988">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4988">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4989">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4989">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4990">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4990">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-4991">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4991">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4992">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4992">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4993">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4993">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4994">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4994">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-4995">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4995">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4996">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4996">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4997">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4997">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4998">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4998">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-4999">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-4999">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5000">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5000">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5001">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5001">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5002">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5002">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5003">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5004">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5004">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5005">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5006">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5006">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5007">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5007">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5008">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5008">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5009">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5010">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5010">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5011">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5012">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5013">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5013">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5014">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5014">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5015">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5015">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5016">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5016">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5017">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5017">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5019">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5019">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5020">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5020">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5021">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5021">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5022">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5022">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5023">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5023">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5024">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5024">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5025">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5025">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5026">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5026">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5027">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5027">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5028">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5028">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5029">autovadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5029">autovadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5030">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5030">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5031">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5031">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5032">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5032">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5033">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5033">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5034">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5034">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5035">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5035">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5036">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5036">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5037">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5037">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5038">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5038">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5039">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5039">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5040">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5041">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5041">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5042">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5043">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5043">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5044">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5044">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5045">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5045">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5046">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5046">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5047">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5047">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5110">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5110">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5111">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5111">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5112">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5113">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5113">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5114">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5115">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5115">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5116">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5116">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5117">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5117">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5118">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5119">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5119">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5120">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5121">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5121">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5122">정규식이 해당 `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5122">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5123">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5123">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5124">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5124">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5125">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5125">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5126">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5126">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5127">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5127">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5128">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5128">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5129">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5129">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5130">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5130">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5131">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5131">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5132">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5132">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5133">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5133">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5134">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5134">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5135">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5135">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5136">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5136">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5137">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5137">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5138">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5138">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5139">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5140">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5141">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5142">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5143">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5143">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5144">From 키워드를 `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5145">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5146">이 함수는 해당 `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5146">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5209">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5209">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5210">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5210">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5211">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5212">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5212">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5213">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5213">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5214">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5214">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5215">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5216">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5217">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5219">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5220">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5221">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5221">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5222">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5222">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5223">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5223">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5225">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5225">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5226">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5226">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5227">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5227">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5228">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5228">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5229">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5229">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5230">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5230">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5231">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5231">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5232">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5232">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5233">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5233">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5234">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5234">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5235">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5235">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5236">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5236">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5237">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5237">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5238">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5239">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5239">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5240">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5241">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5241">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5242">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5242">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5243">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5243">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5244">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5244">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5245">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5245">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5247">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5250">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5250">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5251">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5251">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5252">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5252">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5253">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5253">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5288">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5288">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5289">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5289">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5290">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5291">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5291">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5292">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5292">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5293">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5293">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5294">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5295">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5295">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5296">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5297">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5297">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5298">정규식이 해당 `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5298">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5299">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5299">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5300">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5300">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5301">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5301">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5302">여권 번호 lithunian 여권 번호 passport 암호 없음 o numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5302">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5303">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5303">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5304">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5304">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5305">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5305">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5306">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5306">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5307">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5307">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5308">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5308">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5309">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5309">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5310">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5310">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5311">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5311">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5312">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5313">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5313">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5314">From 키워드를 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5314">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5315">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5315">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5316">이 함수는 해당 `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5316">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
