## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5350">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5350">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5351">중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5351">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5352">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5353">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5353">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5354">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5355">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5355">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5356">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5356">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5357">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5357">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5358">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5358">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5359">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5359">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5360">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5360">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5361">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5361">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5362">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5362">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5363">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5363">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5364">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5364">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5365">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5365">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5366">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5366">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5367">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5367">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5368">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5368">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5369">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5369">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5370">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5370">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5371">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5371">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5372">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5372">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5373">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5373">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5374">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5374">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5375">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5375">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5376">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5376">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5377">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5377">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5378">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5378">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5379">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5380">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5380">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5381">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5382">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5382">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5383">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5383">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5384">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5384">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5385">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5385">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5386">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5386">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5387">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5388">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5388">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5389">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5390">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5391">정규식이 해당 `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5391">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5392">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5392">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5415">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5415">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5416">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5416">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5417">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5418">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5418">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5419">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5420">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5420">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5421">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5421">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5422">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5422">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5423">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5423">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5424">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5424">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5425">정규식이 해당 `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5425">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5426">From 키워드를 `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5426">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5427">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5427">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5428">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5428">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5429">여권 번호 라트비아어 여권 passport 번호 passport passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5429">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5430">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5430">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5431">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5431">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5432">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5433">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5433">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5434">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5435">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5435">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5436">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5436">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5437">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5437">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5438">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5438">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5439">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5439">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5440">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5440">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5441">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5441">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5442">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5442">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5443">From 키워드를 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5443">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5444">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5445">이 함수는 해당 `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5445">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5485">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5485">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5486">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5487">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5487">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5488">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5489">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5489">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5490">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5490">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5491">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5491">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5492">2개 문자로 이루어진 출생지 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5492">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5493">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5493">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5494">임의의 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5494">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5495">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5495">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5496">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5496">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5497">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5497">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5498">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5498">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5499">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5499">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5500">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5500">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5501">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5501">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5526">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5526">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5527">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5527">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5528">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5528">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5529">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5529">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5530">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5531">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5531">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5532">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5533">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5533">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5534">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5534">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5535">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5535">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5536">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5536">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5537">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5537">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5538">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5538">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5539">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5540">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5540">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5543">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5543">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5544">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5544">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5560">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5560">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5561">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5561">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5562">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5563">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5563">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5564">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5565">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5565">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5566">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5566">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5567">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5567">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5568">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5569">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5569">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5570">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5571">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5572">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5572">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5573">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5573">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5574">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5574">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5575">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5575">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5592">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5592">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5593">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5593">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5594">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5595">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5595">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5596">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5596">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5597">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5597">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5598">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5599">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5599">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5600">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5601">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5601">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5602">정규식이 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5602">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5603">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5603">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5604">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5604">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5605">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5605">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5606">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5606">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5607">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5607">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5608">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5608">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5609">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5609">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5610">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5610">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5611">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5611">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5612">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5612">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5613">몰타어 nationals의 경우 지정 된 패턴의 7 자리 및 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5613">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5614">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5614">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5615">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5616">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5616">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5617">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5617">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5618">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5618">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5619">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5619">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5620">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5620">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5621">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5621">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5622">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5622">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5623">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5623">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5625">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5625">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5626">From 키워드를 `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5626">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5627">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5628">이 함수는 해당 `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5628">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5629">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5630">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5630">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5631">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5631">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5632">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5632">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5633">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5633">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5661">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5661">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5662">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5662">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5663">선택적으로 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5663">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5664">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5664">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5665">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5665">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5666">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5666">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5667">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5667">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5668">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5668">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5669">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5669">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5670">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5670">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5671">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5672">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5675">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5675">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5676">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5676">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5677">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5677">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5678">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5678">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5687">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5687">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5688">사용자 관련 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5688">person-related number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5691">persoonsgebonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5691">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5692">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5692">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5693">사회 aal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5693">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5694">사회적-회계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5694">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5695">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5695">sofi</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5698">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5698">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5699">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5699">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5700">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5700">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5701">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5701">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5702">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5702">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5703">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5703">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5704">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5705">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5705">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5707">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5707">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5708">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5709">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5709">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5710">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5711">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5712">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5712">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5713">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5713">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5714">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5714">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5715">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5715">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5718">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5718">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5719">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5719">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5720">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5720">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5723">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5723">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5724">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5724">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5725">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5725">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5726">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5726">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5727">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5727">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5728">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5728">permis de conduire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5729">rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5729">rijbewijs</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5730">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5730">rijbewijsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5731">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5731">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5732">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5732">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5733">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5734">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5734">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5735">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5736">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5736">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5737">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5737">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5738">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5738">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5739">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5739">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5740">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5740">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5741">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5741">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5742">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5742">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5744">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5744">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5768">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5768">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5769">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5769">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5770">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5771">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5771">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5772">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5773">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5773">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5774">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5775">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5775">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5776">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5777">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5777">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5778">정규식이 해당 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5778">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5779">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5779">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5780">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5780">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5783">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5783">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5784">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5784">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5785">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5785">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5786">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5786">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5787">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5787">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5788">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5788">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5789">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5789">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5790">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5790">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5791">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5792">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5792">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5793">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5794">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5794">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5795">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5795">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5796">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5796">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5797">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5797">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5798">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5798">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5799">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5799">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5800">From 키워드를 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5800">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5801">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5801">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5802">이 함수는 해당 `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5802">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5840">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5840">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5841">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5842">3개 문자, 공백 1개(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5842">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5844">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5844">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5845">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5845">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5846">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5846">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5847">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5847">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5848">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5848">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5849">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5849">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5850">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5850">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5851">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5851">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5852">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5852">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5853">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5853">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5854">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5854">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5855">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5855">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5856">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5856">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5857">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5857">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5858">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5858">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5859">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5860">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5860">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5861">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5862">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5862">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5863">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5863">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5864">3자리 개인 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5864">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5865">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5865">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5870">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5870">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5871">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5871">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5872">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5872">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5873">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5873">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5874">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5874">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5875">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5884">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5884">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5885">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5886">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5886">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5887">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5888">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5888">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5889">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5889">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5890">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5890">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5891">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5891">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5892">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5892">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5893">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5893">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5894">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5895">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5895">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5896">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5897">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5897">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5898">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5898">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5899">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5899">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5900">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5900">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5901">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5901">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5902">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5902">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5903">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5903">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5904">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5904">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5905">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5905">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5906">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5906">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5907">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5907">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5908">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5909">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5909">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5910">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5911">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5911">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5912">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5912">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5913">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5913">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5914">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5914">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5915">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5915">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5916">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5916">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5917">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5918">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5920">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5921">정규식이 해당 `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5921">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5922">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5922">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5923">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5924">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5924">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5925">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5925">dl#</span></span>
