- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5927">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5927">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5928">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5928">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5929">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5929">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5930">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5930">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5931">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5931">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5932">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5932">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5933">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5933">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5934">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5934">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5935">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5935">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5936">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5936">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5937">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5937">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5938">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5938">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5939">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5940">3개의 문자 및 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5940">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5941">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5942">3개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5942">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5943">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5943">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5944">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5944">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5945">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5945">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5946">DLP 정책은 300 Func_polish_national_id 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5947">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5948">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5949">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5949">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5950">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5950">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5951">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5951">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5952">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5952">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5953">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5953">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5954">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5954">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5955">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5955">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5956">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5956">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5957">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5957">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5958">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5958">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5959">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5959">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5960">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5960">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5961">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5961">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5962">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5962">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5963">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5963">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5964">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5964">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5965">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5965">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5966">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5966">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5967">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5967">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5968">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5968">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5969">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5969">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5970">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5971">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5971">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5972">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5972">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5973">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5973">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5974">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5974">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5975">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5975">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5976">niepowtarzalny u r i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5976">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5977">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5977">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5978">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5978">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5979">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5979">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5980">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5980">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5981">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5981">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5982">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5982">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5983">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5983">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5984">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5984">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5985">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5985">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5986">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5986">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5987">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5987">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5988">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5988">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5989">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5989">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5990">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5990">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5991">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5991">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-5992">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5992">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5993">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5993">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5994">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5995">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5996">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5996">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-5997">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5997">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-5998">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-5998">Numer paszportu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6001">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6001">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6002">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6002">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6003">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6003">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6004">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6005">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6005">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6007">11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6007">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6008">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6009">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6009">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6011">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6012">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6012">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6013">From 키워드를 `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6013">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6014">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6014">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6015">이 함수는 해당 `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6015">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6016">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6016">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6017">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6017">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6022">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6022">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6025">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6025">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6045">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6045">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6046">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6046">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6047">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6047">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6048">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6049">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6049">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6050">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6051">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6051">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6052">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6053">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6054">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6055">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6055">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6056">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6056">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6057">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6057">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6058">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6058">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6063">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6063">document number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6066">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6066">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6067">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6067">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6068">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6068">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6069">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6069">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6070">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6070">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6071">nic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6071">nic</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6077">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6077">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6078">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6078">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6079">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6080">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6080">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6081">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6081">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6082">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6082">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6083">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6083">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6084">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6084">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6085">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6085">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6086">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6086">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6087">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6087">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6088">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6089">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6089">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6090">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6091">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6091">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6092">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6092">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6093">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6093">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6094">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6094">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6095">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6095">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6098">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6098">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6099">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6099">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6100">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6100">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6101">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6101">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6102">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6102">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6103">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6103">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6104">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6104">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6105">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6105">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6106">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6106">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6107">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6107">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6108">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6108">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6109">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6109">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6110">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6110">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6112">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6112">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6114">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6114">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6115">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6115">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6116">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6116">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6117">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6117">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6118">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6118">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6119">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6119">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6120">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6120">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6121">정규식이 해당 `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6121">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6122">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6122">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6123">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6123">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6124">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6124">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6125">여권 번호 포르투갈어 passport 번호 passport número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6125">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6126">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6126">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6127">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6128">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6129">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6129">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6130">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6131">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6131">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6132">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6133">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6134">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6136">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6136">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6137">From 키워드를 `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6137">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6138">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6139">이 함수는 해당 `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6139">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6164">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6164">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6165">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6165">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6166">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6167">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6167">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6169">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6169">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6170">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6170">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6171">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6171">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6173">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6176">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6176">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6177">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6177">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6178">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6178">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6183">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6183">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6184">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6184">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6186">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6186">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6187">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6187">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6188">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6188">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6189">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6189">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6190">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6190">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6192">permis de conducere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6192">permis de conducere</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6193">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6193">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6194">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6194">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6195">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6196">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6196">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6197">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6197">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6198">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6198">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6199">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6199">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6200">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6200">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6201">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6201">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6202">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6203">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6203">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6204">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6204">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6205">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6205">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6206">이 함수는 해당 `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6206">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6257">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6257">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6258">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6258">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6259">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6260">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6260">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6261">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6262">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6262">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6263">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6264">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6264">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6265">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6266">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6267">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6267">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6268">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6268">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6269">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6269">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6270">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6270">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6271">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6271">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6272">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6272">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6273">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6273">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6274">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6274">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6275">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6275">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6276">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6276">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6277">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6277">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6278">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6278">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6279">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6279">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6280">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6280">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6281">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6282">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6282">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6285">정규식이 해당 `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6285">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6286">From 키워드를 `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6286">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6337">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6337">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6338">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6339">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6339">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6340">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6341">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6341">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6342">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6343">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6345">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6346">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6346">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6347">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6347">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6348">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6348">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6352">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6352">ID number</span></span>

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6354">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6354">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6356">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6356">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6357">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6358">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6358">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6359">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6359">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6360">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6360">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6361">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6361">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6363">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6363">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6365">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6366">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6366">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6367">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6367">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6368">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6369">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6370">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6370">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6371">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6371">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6382">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6382">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6383">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6383">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6384">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6385">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6385">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6386">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6387">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6387">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6388">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6388">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6389">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6389">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6390">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6391">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6391">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6394">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6394">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6395">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6395">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6396">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6396">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6397">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6397">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6398">dl # driver license driver 면허 번호 드라이버 라이선스 드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6398">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6399">drivers license driver 면허 드라이버의 라이선스 드라이버 라이선스 번호 운전 면허 번호 라이센스 번호 제어 # vodičský preukaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6399">drivers license drivers licence driver's license driver's license number driver's licence number driving license number dlno# vodičský preukaz</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6400">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6400">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6401">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6401">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6402">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6403">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6403">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6404">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6405">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6405">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6406">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6407">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6407">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6410">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6410">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6411">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6411">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6412">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6412">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6413">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6413">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />

        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6415">Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6415">Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6460">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6460">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6461">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6461">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6462">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6462">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6463">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6463">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6464">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6464">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6465">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6465">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6466">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6466">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6467">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6467">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6468">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6468">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6469">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6469">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6470">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6470">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6471">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6471">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6472">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6472">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6473">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6473">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6474">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6474">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6475">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6475">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6476">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6476">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6477">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6477">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6478">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6478">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6479">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6479">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6480">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6480">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6481">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6481">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6482">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6482">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6483">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6483">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6484">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6485">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6485">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6486">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6487">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6487">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6488">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6488">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6489">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6489">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6536">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6536">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6537">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6537">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6539">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6539">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6541">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6541">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6542">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6543">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6543">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6544">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6545">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6545">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6546">정규식이 해당 `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6546">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6547">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6547">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6549">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6549">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6552">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6552">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6553">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6553">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6557">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6557">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6558">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6558">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6559">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6559">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6560">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6560">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6561">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6561">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6563">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6563">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6564">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6564">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6565">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6566">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6566">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6567">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6568">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6568">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6569">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6569">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6570">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6570">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6571">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6571">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6572">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6572">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6573">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6574">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6574">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c707d-6575">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6576">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6577">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6577">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6578">From 키워드를 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6578">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c707d-6579">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6579">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c707d-6580">이 함수는 해당 `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c707d-6580">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
